name: URECKON INNOVATION CHALLENGE
description: A platform for participants to demonstrate their hardware or software models to judges. Special credits are given to models in AI, IoT, Automation, Disaster Management, Energy Conservation, Healthcare & Cleanliness.

rules.team_size: Maximum 5 members (at least one member must be present with the model at all times)
rules.eligibility: Team members may be from the same or different colleges
event_rules: Each team must bring their own equipment; no electronic components will be provided.
Each team must bring a description chart (model name, model description, utility, etc.).
Judges will evaluate models based on originality, feasibility, impact, and scalability.

name: URECKON INTERNATIONAL CODING CHALLENGE
description: The ultimate battleground for competitive programmers at Ureckon 2025. Participants solve complex problems with speed and precision to claim victory.

event_rules: Contest will be hosted on the Hackerrank platform.
Use of electronic gadgets and the internet for unfair means is strictly prohibited.
Plagiarism will result in immediate disqualification.
Coordinators' decisions are final in all aspects of the competition.

name: TECH-EXPO
description: An event designed for school students to display models, posters, and presentations related to emerging technology. Industry professionals and participants can network and share knowledge.

rules.eligibility: Participants must be school students (class 8 to 12)
event_rules: Projects must be based on cutting-edge technology.
Participants must bring all necessary equipment (poster, laptops, extension cables, batteries, etc.).
PowerPoint presentations are allowed, but teams must bring their own devices to display them.
